description: Miitopia needs YOU…to cast Mii characters for the three trailers in the Casting Call demo. Fill the roles with characters you create, or choose characters made by others. Then cast them, sit back, and watch your actors play their parts!
name: Miitopia™: Casting Call
disclaimer:
Use Parental Controls to restrict 3D mode for children 6 and under.

You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
